QuestData.Title: The Ruins of Burning Blade
QuestData.Description: These ogre hunting parties are a precursor to invasion. We must strike at them before they have a chance to amass an army big enough to take over our town.$B$BYou're going to need to get your hands dirty, $r.$B$BThe largest collection of Boulderfist in this region can be found at the Burning Blade Ruins, almost directly east of Telaar, near the border of Terokkar. Go there and show the Boulderfist that Telaar will not bend to their will!
QuestData.LogDescription: Mo'mor the Breaker at Telaar in Nagrand wants you to kill 8 Boulderfist Crushers and 8 Boulderfist Mystics.
QuestData.CompletionText: We have only recently taken back Telaar. We will not lose it again!
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. Did you happen to locate this Lantresor creature that the stupid one's letter mentioned?$B$BRegardless, we must press on. I have gotten reports of more ogre activity that must be dealt with at once!
